page.title: 09RECREATION IN BAGILT
page.content: There are 95 children in our school 8 children in the school attend Kung Fu at Courtaulds club,Greenfield.3 children attend Thai boxing at Bryn- -ford.7 children are members of a guide,brownies,scouts,cub pack held at Bagillt or Holywell.2 children attend the Bagillt youth club.9 children attend Holywell swimming club. A high percentage of the adult population attend the old Mecca cinema which is the local bingo hall.Bingo sessions are held 3/4 times a week.Watching television is very popular in the area.Video films have become more popular during 5 years.28% of the school population have a video recorder .Listening to the radio is quite popular.Attending cinemas/theatres is poor due to the distance involved and cost.
